## vela app ls

List applications

### Synopsis

List applications with workloads, traits, status and created time

```
vela app ls
```

### Examples

```
vela app ls
```

### Options

```
  -a, --app string   Application name
  -h, --help         help for ls
```

```
  -e, --env string   specify environment name for application
```
